Package scheduleApp.DBAccess

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduleApp.DBAccess.UserDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<User>
    public class UserDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO<User>
    The UserDAO class is an implementation of the DAO Interface. It handles the CRUD operations on the database for the users table.
    Author:
    Jason Jackson

    • Method Detail

      • verifyUser

        public static boolean verifyUser​(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password)
        This method verifies a single user's log in attempt. It will check the database if the username and password match. If a match is found, it will return true, else it will return false.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        whether the login is valid

      • getLoggedInUser

        Returns:

        public User read​(int id)
        This method reads a single user from the database, based off the user ID.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
